topics.body:
Now time for some crazy Laws that are dumb in other states

I start out with Arizona
"Donkeys cannot sleep in bathtubs."
Well then that's stupid.

Next is Alabama
"Bear wrestling matches are prohibited."
Makes sense don't want to fight a Bear.

Next is Arkansas
"It’s strictly prohibited to pronounce “Arkansas” incorrectly"
Well then people have speech impenitents.

Next is California
"Bathhouses are against the law."
I can see why now.

Next is Colorado
"It is illegal to ride a horse while under the influence."
Yeah because riding a horse is more dangerous than driving a car.

Next is Connecticut
"In order for a pickle to officially be considered a pickle, it must bounce."
WAT

That's it for now.
